decision_conditions: The development shall be implemented in accordance with the approved plans C374 - 22 Rev G in relation to the soakaway and surface water drainage system and shall thereafter be permanently maintained.

To ensure the development does not increase the risk of flooding in accordance with Policies DMEI 9 and DMEI 10 of the Hillingdon Local Plan Part 2 (2020) and Policies SI2 and SI 13 of the London Plan (2021).
The applicant is advised that this non-material amendment relates only to the wording of Condition 11 of planning permission ref:  76184/APP/2025/1051, dated 18-06-25.

Notwithstanding the non-material amendment hereby approved, all other conditions relating to planning permission ref:  76184/APP/2025/1051, dated 18-06-25 must be discharged/adhered to as per that permission.
description: Non-material amendment to planning permission ref. 76184/APP/2025/1051, dated 18-06-25 (Erection of a two storey detached dwelling house, vehicular crossover, and associated parking, following the demolition of existing dwelling house) to amend Condition 11 to compliance wording
